enhanced_description: SCS universal, also known as Siddhartha Consultancy Services, is an HR consulting firm based in Delhi NCR, India, established in 2009. The firm specializes in a comprehensive range of HR services including IT Recruitments, IT Staffing, HR Advisory Services, and Labor & Industrial Relations (IR) Compliance Retainership and training. They also offer expertise in Training and Development, Performance Management through KRA & KPI measurements, Competency Mapping, Organizational Development (OD), and HR Policies. SCS universal aims to help clients boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, hire top talent faster and more efficiently, and reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees. Managed by veteran HR professionals, SCS universal serves a diverse client base across various industries including MNCs, Government Organizations, Electronics, Retail, FMCG, Education, Manufacturing, Medical Device Industry, IT and Software, and Real Estate.
